location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 14/115 IX B 25 Abu Musa Red Oxide.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged chronologically from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation starts with the first folio of text after the titlepage and continues through to the final folio. Folios 216-218 are pages of Arabic text and are foliated in reverse order to the rest of the sequence. The foliation system can also become a pagination system when text is present on both side of a folio. The foliation sequence also skips folios 171, 172 and 204.

mods.abstract: Correspondence concerning the mining of red oxide on Abu Musa island, issues involved in its commercial exploitation, and the award of the concession. Correspondence discusses the interest of Franck C. Stick and Co. Ltd. as well as Persian interest.Corrrespondents include the Political Resident Persian Gulf; Frank C. Strick and Co.; H.M. Consulate Bandar Abbas; Deputy Secretary to the Government of India; Residency Agent Sharjah; Khalid bin Ahmad, Sheikh of Sharjah.

name.namePart: Frank C Strick and Company Limited, shipping company
